Name: Crystal Rider
About the game: Another robber goes on a journey underground in order to collect all the treasures of the abandoned caves hidden in themselves and to meet many obstacles left by an extinct civilization. Some of which can still hurt! Crystal Rider is a 2d platformer with elements of a system of traps and exercises for each level, at each level there are more traps and dangers, difficulty on the level and a variety of obstacles. Features of the game: - Increasing complexity - Unique traps - Dynamic Music
